mapper.update: UPDATE customer c, (SELECT customer_id, MAX(rental_date), DATEDIFF(NOW(), MAX(rental_date)) FROM rental GROUP BY customer_id HAVING DATEDIFF(NOW(), MAX(rental_date)) > 365) A SET c.active = 0 WHERE c.customer_id = A.customer_id
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT r.customer_id customerId, i.inventory_id, i.film_id, r.rental_date, r.return_date, DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) DAY, if(DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) IS NULL, '대여중', if(DATEDIFF(r.return_date, r.rental_date) > f.rental_duration, '연체', '정상반납')) state, f.rental_duration FROM inventory i JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id JOIN rental r ON r.inventory_id = i.inventory_id) e WHERE e.state='연체' AND e.customerId=#{customerId}
